name: project-reclamation
description: The Server Application for Monday Morning under Project Infinity

scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.docs:md: npx jsdoc2md -c ./.jsdoc.conf.js -f ./server/app.js > ./docs/APP.md && npx jsdoc2md -c ./.jsdoc.conf.js -f ./server/config/*.js > ./docs/CONFIG.md && npx jsdoc2md -c ./.jsdoc.conf.js -f ./server/controllers/*.js > ./docs/CONTROLLERS.md && npx jsdoc2md -c ./.jsdoc.conf.js -f ./server/schema/**/*.js > ./docs/SCHEMA.md && npx jsdoc2md -c ./.jsdoc.conf.js -f ./server/router/*.js > ./docs/ROUTES.md

author: MM Tech Team 2020-21
